Title: Adrift
Genre: Action, Adventure, Biography, Drama, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Aaron Kandell (screenplay by), Jordan Kandell (screenplay by), David Branson Smith (screenplay by), Tami Ashcraft (based on the book by), Susea McGearhart (based on the book with)
Actors: Shailene Woodley, Sam Claflin, Jeffrey Thomas, Elizabeth Hawthorne
Plot: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.
